item.title: Hi,
item.description: I’m a verbal & visual artist. I interpret and recreat the world trhoug words and images. I was born and raised in a small city in the South of Brazil, but now I’m living under de Tuscan sun, in the heart of beautiful Italy. Email: catielle@posteo.net Instagram: @catielleandressa Linkedin: Catielle Andressa Medium: @catielle
